name: silver-powder
effect:
Held in battle
:   Holder's bug-type moves have 1.2× their power.
short_effect: Held: Bug-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A hold item that
raises the power of
BUG-type moves.

the power of BUG-type moves.
